EmailTemplate.name: OA Toggle Auto Creation Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: OA Approved Toggl Project Auto-Creation for {!TASKRAY__Project__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To Whom It May Concern:
Please be advised that OA approved Toggl Project Auto-Creation has been approved for the TaskRay Project {!TASKRAY__Project__c.Name}:
https://doctorevidence.my.salesforce.com/{!TASKRAY__Project__c.Id}
No further action is required by any other OA approver at this time.
Thanks, System Administrator
